questions.question_text_1: Suppose a survey asks respondents to indicate their favorite type of food (e.g., Italian, Chinese, Indian, Mexican). Which of the following option(s) is (are) true?
question_texts: Suppose a survey asks respondents to indicate their favorite type of food (e.g., Italian, Chinese, Indian, Mexican). Which of the following option(s) is (are) true?

questions.question_text_1: A teacher randomly selects 5 students from each class in a school. Based on the performance of these students, she wants to assess the overall performance of the school. Which of the following option(s) is (are) true?
question_texts: A teacher randomly selects 5 students from each class in a school. Based on the performance of these students, she wants to assess the overall performance of the school. Which of the following option(s) is (are) true?

options.option_text: Students of a particular class will represent the population.
Students of a particular class form the sample.
The school as a whole represents the population.
The 5 students from each class form the sample.

questions.question_text_1: A grocery store owner wants to analyze the prices of different brands of packaged snacks in his store. He randomly collected 10 snack packets and their prices (in rupees) are 120, 450, 620, 200, 280, 670, 150, 190, 310, 400 respectively. Based on the given information, answer the given sub-questions:
question_texts: A grocery store owner wants to analyze the prices of different brands of packaged snacks in his store. He randomly collected 10 snack packets and their prices (in rupees) are 120, 450, 620, 200, 280, 670, 150, 190, 310, 400 respectively. Based on the given information, answer the given sub-questions:

questions.question_text_1: At what price do the top 25% of snack packets start? (More than one option can be correct)
question_texts: At what price do the top 25% of snack packets start? (More than one option can be correct)

options.option_text: It corresponds to the third quartile.
It corresponds to the first quartile.
